attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian refugees access to the country
attributes.additional_details: These people are victims of a violent dictator through no fault of their own. They deserve to live in peace.
attributes.background: Waive Visa requirements for Ukrainian refugees to be able to enter the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
